meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed a cutaneous cream for the rash.
meanings.sent2: Proper skincare is essential for maintaining cutaneous health.
meanings.sent3: The cutaneous lotion smelled like fresh flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as soft and smooth as a cutaneous touch.
meanings.sent5: The sunburn left a painful cutaneous sensation on her shoulders.

meanings.sent1: The cutaneous infection required immediate treatment.
meanings.sent2: Wearing sunscreen helps prevent cutaneous damage from UV rays.
meanings.sent3: The cutaneous reaction to the new soap was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His words had a cutaneous effect on her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The cutaneous irritation caused discomfort throughout the day.

meanings.definition: located on or near the skin
meanings.sent1: The cutaneous nerves are sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent2: The cutaneous blood vessels play a crucial role in regulating body temperature.
meanings.sent3: The cutaneous marker was placed near the wound.
meanings.sent4: The cutaneous layer of the skin acts as a protective barrier.
meanings.sent5: The cutaneous discoloration was visible even from a distance.
